item.title: Scalability and feet and asses
item.description: I love talking about scalability. Everyone has their own opinion, their own way of performing benchmarks and their own conclusions. And we all know that this is very silly. I recently came across an article by Ted Dziuba that summarizes it very nicely for you: Shut up about scalability, no one is using your app anyway. I love how the author explains the use of the word scalability in this day and age:
